data.title: The energy war of the 21st century isn't about oil anymore
data.description: The IEA says global data center spending will hit $580B in 2025—more than new oil supplies—as AI sends electricity demand soaring.
data.author: The AI Insider
data.keywords: Artificial intelligence, China, data centres, Data clusters, Electricity, International Energy Agency, Renewable Energy, Saudi Arabia, United States, Virginia, World Energy Outlook 2025
